entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
